metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30465 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: runc before 1.0.0-rc95 allows a Container Filesystem Breakout via DirectoryTraversal. To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker must be able to createmultiple containers with a fairly specific mount configuration. The problemoccurs via a symlink-exchange attack that relies on a race condition.

criterions.comment: runc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
